title: Dry pastures and flood plains
creator_contributor_role: Australian Commonwealth Film Unit, production company
subject_group: Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Water resources development
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Farm management - Australia
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Dairy farming - Australia
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Dairy research - Australia
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Irrigation farming - Australia
description: As well as the difficulties encountered in selling Australia's surplus of dairy products over our domestic needs, dairy farmers face extremes of climate conditions - lack of adequate regular rainfall, flooding, poor soil, etc. Examines ways of overcoming these difficulties via research into pasture improvement and its application and the introduction of new and improved farming machinery and equipment.
